headline: Prediction: These Will Be the Two Best-Performing "Magnificent Seven" Stocks Over the Next 5 Years

headline: Meta deepens AI push with 'Superintelligence' lab, source says
summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg has reorganized the company's artificial intelligence efforts under a new division called Meta Superintelligence Labs, according to a source on Monday. The division will be headed by Alexandr Wang, former CEO of data labeling startup Scale AI. He will be the chief AI officer of the new initiative at the social media giant, the source said.

headline: Tech Industry Cheers Canada's Withdrawal of Digital Tax
summary: The tech industry is rejoicing after Canada withdrew its digital-services tax, which would have cost the sector billions of dollars per year starting Monday. "We welcome the Canadian government’s decision to withdraw this ill-advised measure," said Megan Funkhouser, senior director of tax and trade policy at the Information Technology Industry Council.

headline: Paren Announces Advisory Board Members, Including Gabe Klein, Former Director of the U.S. Joint Office of Energy and Transportation
summary: Paren Inc., a leading provider of electric vehicle (EV) charging data analytics and insights, today announced the formation of its Advisory Board, chaired by Gabe Klein, former Director of the U.S. Joint Office of Energy and Transportation. The board, which also includes senior leaders from Google, Lyft, and Stanford's Graduate School of Business, will guide Paren in its path to continued growth.

headline: Chinese tech stocks soar in 2025 while US giants stall
summary: US tech giants may be treading water in 2025, but Chinese tech stocks are up nearly 20% this year. Morning Brief: Market Sunrise host Ramzan Karmali breaks down what’s behind the rally in China and whether investors should rethink their bet on the Magnificent Seven — the group of tech stocks comprised of Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL), Apple (AAPL), Nvidia (NVDA), Tesla (TSLA), Amazon, Meta Platforms (META), and Microsoft (MSFT). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief: Market Sunrise here.
